name: Dr Mark Abani
goal: I consult on a number of topics - Trade, Agriculture, Taxation and Internally Generated Revenue and provide training on the above subjects plus Leadership and Management across the Private Sector, Government, Academia and Not For Profit entities - mainly but not exclusively, in Nigeria.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Enterprise, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU West Africa Economic Partnership Agreement
EU Nigeria Business Forum
AU-EU Investing in a Food Secure Future 4-6 July
European Parliament Hearing 'Africa Rising' Brussels 13 July
EU-Nig 5th Annual Trade Conference 2016
